languages.text: "Ты ошибаешься, Паскаль. Есть запреты, которым следовать почетно. И никто не вправе наделять себя священным статусом, как бы велик ни был — это во власти одного Императора".
"You are wrong, Pasqal. Prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."
languages.original_text: "Ты ошибаешься, Паскаль. Есть запреты, которым следовать почетно. И никто не вправе наделять себя священным статусом, как бы велик ни был — это во власти одного Императора".

traits.locale_text: "You are wrong, Pasqal. There are prohibitions worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."
"You are wrong, Pasqal. There are prohibitions worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."
"You are wrong, Pasqal. Some prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."
"You are wrong, Pasqal. Some prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."
"You are wrong, Pasqal. Prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."
"You are wrong, Pasqal. Prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."

languages.text: 「パスカル、お前は間違っている。禁止は守るべきだ。どんなに偉大であろうと、自分を神聖と名乗る権利は誰にもない。その権威は唯一、皇帝陛下にのみ属するのだ」
languages.original_text: "You are wrong, Pasqal. Prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、お前は間違っている。守るべき禁止事項もある。どんなに偉大であろうと、自分を神聖と名乗る権利は誰にもない。その権威は唯一、皇帝陛下にのみ属するのだ」
「パスカル、お前は間違っている。守るべき禁止事項もある。どんなに偉大であろうと、自分を神聖と名乗る権利は誰にもない。その権威は唯一、皇帝陛下にのみ属するのだ」

languages.text: "Ihr irrt Euch, Pasqal. Verbote sind es wert, dass man ihnen gehorcht. Niemand hat das Recht, sich selbst heilig zu nennen, wie großartig er auch sein mag – diese Autorität obliegt dem Imperator allein."
languages.original_text: "You are wrong, Pasqal. Prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr irrt Euch, Pasqal. Verbote sind es wert, dass man ihnen gehorcht. Niemand hat das Recht, sich selbst heilig zu nennen, wie großartig er auch sein mag – diese Autorität obliegt dem Imperator allein."

languages.text: «Se equivoca, Pasqal. Las prohibiciones están para obedecerlas. Nadie tiene derecho a considerarse sagrado, independientemente de lo grandioso que sea. Esa autoridad pertenece exclusivamente al Emperador».
languages.original_text: "You are wrong, Pasqal. Prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."

traits.locale_text: «Se equivoca, Pasqal. Las prohibiciones están para obedecerlas. Nadie tiene derecho a considerarse sagrado, independientemente de lo grandioso que sea. Esa autoridad pertenece exclusivamente al Emperador».

languages.text: “你错了，帕斯卡，禁令是值得遵守的。哪怕是再怎么伟大的人，也无权以‘神圣’自居，只有帝皇本人才拥有这样的权利。”
languages.original_text: "You are wrong, Pasqal. Prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."

traits.locale_text: “你错了，帕斯卡，禁令是值得遵守的。哪怕是再怎么伟大的人，也无权以‘神圣’自居，只有帝皇本人才拥有这样的权利。”
“你错了，帕斯卡，有些禁令是值得遵守的。哪怕是再怎么伟大的人，也无权以‘神圣’自居，只有帝皇本人才拥有这样的权利。”

languages.text: "Yanılıyorsun Pasqal. Yasaklar uymaya değerdir. Ayrıca hiç kimse, ne kadar yüce olursa olsun kendini kutsal ilan etme hakkına sahip değildir. O yetki, sadece ve sadece İmparator'a aittir."
languages.original_text: "You are wrong, Pasqal. Prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."

traits.locale_text: "Yanılıyorsun Pasqal. Yasaklar uymaya değerdir. Ayrıca hiç kimse, ne kadar yüce olursa olsun kendini kutsal ilan etme hakkına sahip değildir. O yetki, sadece ve sadece İmparator'a aittir."
"Yanılıyorsun Pasqal. Bazı yasaklar uymaya değerdir. Ayrıca hiç kimse, ne kadar yüce olursa olsun kendini kutsal ilan etme hakkına sahip değildir. Bu otorite, sadece ve sadece İmparator'a aittir."

languages.original_text: "You are wrong, Pasqal. Some prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."

languages.text: « Vous avez tort, Pasqal. Les interdits méritent d'être respectés. Nul, aussi important soit-il, n'a le droit de se proclamer sacré. Cette prérogative n'appartient qu'à l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "You are wrong, Pasqal. Prohibitions are worth obeying. No one has the right to name themselves sacred, no matter how great they may be — that authority belongs to the Emperor alone."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez tort, Pasqal. Les interdits méritent d'être respectés. Nul, aussi important soit-il, n'a le droit de se proclamer sacré. Cette prérogative n'appartient qu'à l'Empereur. »
« Vous avez tort, Pasqal. Certains interdits méritent d'être respectés. Nul, aussi important soit-il, n'a le droit de se proclamer sacré. Cette prérogative n'appartient qu'à l'Empereur. »
